mapper.select: select c.c_code,c.t_code,c.c_name,c.c_price,c.c_conditions,c.img,c.c_place,c.f_sh,c.sh_name,m.month,m.c_code,m.earth,t.start_time,t.end_time from (creature c inner join month m on c.c_code = m.c_code) inner join time_zone on m.t_zone_a = t.t_code and m.t_zone_b = t.code

select c.c_code,c.t_code,c.c_name,c.c_price,c.s_conditions,c.img,c.c_place,c.f_sh,c.sh_name,c.dle_flg,m.c_month,m.earth,m.t_zone_a,m.t_zone_b from creature as c inner join month as m on c.c_code = m.c_code where m.c_month = month(now())
